title: No ticket response for two weeks
body: Anything I can do to help speed up the process

replies.body:
Whatever you do, don't bump. Tickets don't work the same as they do in the vBoards.

What you can do is submit the ticket again, with a slightly different subject and info. Only if it's been two weeks though, holy. Normal I get a response in a day, even if I get the "Support is busy right now, wait a moment" message from them.

Do make sure that you didn't miss anything in your inbox.
